name: Meline and the tower of illusion
name_original: Meline and the tower of illusion
description:
Meline and the tower of illusion is a short 10 minutes lenght puzzle plataformer where "failure is progress", can you climb the tower of ilusion and discovery the secret of it?

STORY

There are several legends about a mysterious tower near the city, some say that it suddenly appeared there, while others say that it was always there, the only certainty that the people of that city has is that everyone who ever entered that tower never came back. One day, Meline, a 23-year-old girl, decided to enter this tower to find out why people never return from there...

EVERY WIN IS A FAIL

In this tower, you need to fail in order to progress... how many times the tower will trick you to follow the objective?

EACH FLOOR IS DIFERENT

There's 5 floors, each one with a diferent theme, ost and challange.

FEATURES

  • 5 floors - Each one having a diferent way to be completed, can you discovery how?
  • 15 archiviments - for those who like platinum games ;)
  • 2 endings - Don't have much to say about they... just good luck ;D
  • 10 minutes lenght gameplay - Really short, but made with much love :3
  • Dinamic narrator - almost every action will trigger a diferent reaction of him.
  • "failure is progress" - Well... interpret the way you want.

CREDITS
